org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.gui.widgets
Class MapPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.gui.widgets.MapPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, INavigatableComponent, IRouteChangedListener
public class MapPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements INavigatableComponent, IRouteChangedListener

The MapPanel exists to render a rectangular area of the DataSet.

Author:
Marcus Wolschon

getCenter

public EastNorth getCenter()
Specified by:
getCenter in interface INavigatableComponent
Returns:
Returns the center point. A copy is returned, so users cannot change the center by accessing the return value. Use zoomTo instead.

getLeftUpper

public LatLon getLeftUpper()
Specified by:
getLeftUpper in interface INavigatableComponent
Returns:
Returns the left upper point. A copy is returned, so users cannot change the center by accessing the return value. Use zoomTo instead.
